info: Project 2 will (i) construct a new 2-lane bypass road of 14 km skirting Batumi; (ii) improve border infrastructure at Sarpi for customs clearance, vehicle and passenger inspection, cross-border procedures and documentation; (iii) finance construction supervision; (iv) support for implementation; and (v) carry out a feasibility study and detailed design of tranche 3.
name: MFF-ROAD CORRIDOR INVESTMENT PROGRAM - TRANCHE 2
